emailauth-token-label: Label of the verification token input field.
emailauth-token-help: API help message for the verification token field.
emailauth-email-subject: Subject of the email containing the verification code. $1 is the site name.
emailauth-email-body-intro:
Part of the body of the email containing the verification code. 

Parameters:
* $1 - the receiving user's username
* $2 - the name of the site
{{format|text}}
emailauth-email-body-code-text:
Part of the body of the email containing the verification code.
{{format|text}}
emailauth-email-body-warning:
Part of the body of the email containing the verification code.

Parameters:
* $1 - time after which the code will expire (in human-readable form, e.g. "1 hour")
{{format|text}}
emailauth-email-body-attack-heading:
Part of the body of the email containing the verification code.

Parameters:
* $1 - the name of the site
{{format|text}}
emailauth-email-body-attack-p1:
Part of the body of the email containing the verification code.
{{format|text}}
emailauth-email-body-attack-p2:
Part of the body of the email containing the verification code.
{{format|text}}
emailauth-email-body-help-text:
Part of the body of the email containing the verification code.

Parameters:
* $1 - the URL of the help page ({{msg-mw|emailauth-email-help-url|notext=1}})
{{format|text}}
emailauth-login-message: Message telling the user that a verification email has been sent. $1 is the email address.
emailauth-login-message-no-email: Message telling the user that a verification email has been sent. Email address is not included in the message.
emailauth-login-help: Help message for the token input field. Useful in case the user cannot access to the token by email.
emailauth-login-failure: Error message when the entered verification code was wrong.
emailauth-login-retry-limit: Error message when the verification code was entered incorrectly too many times. (The user will be forced to restart the login process.)
emailauth-accountrecovery-intro: Title and description for the account recovery special page
emailauth-accountrecovery-username-label: Label for the username input field on the account recovery form
emailauth-accountrecovery-contactemail-l: Label for the contact email input field on the account recovery form
emailauth-accountrecovery-contactemail-c: Label for the contact email confirmation input field on the account recovery form
emailauth-accountrecovery-registeredemai: Label for the registered email input field on the account recovery form
emailauth-accountrecovery-description-la: Label for the additional comments textarea on the account recovery form
emailauth-accountrecovery-success: Success message shown after submitting an account recovery request
emailauth-accountrecovery-email-mismatch: Error message when the two email addresses entered do not match
emailauth-accountrecovery-invalid-email: Error message when an invalid email address is entered
emailauth-accountrecovery-rate-limited: Error message when too many account recovery requests have been submitted
emailauth-accountrecovery-error-generic: Generic error message when the account recovery request fails
emailauth-accountrecovery-error-invalid-: Error message when the submitted data could not be processed by the service
emailauth-accountrecovery-error-service-: Error message when the account recovery service is temporarily unavailable
emailauth-accountrecovery-disabled: Error message shown when the account recovery feature is not enabled on the wiki (when $wgEmailAuthEnableAccountRecovery is false)
